mapper.select: select PJT_PR_NO ,PJT_PR_TITLE ,PJT_PR_START ,PJT_PR_PERIOD ,PJT_PR_DEADLINE ,PJT_PR_STACK ,PJT_PR_FACE ,PJT_PR_CONTENT ,PJT_PR_FIELD ,PJT_PR_CAPACITY ,PJT_PR_RECRUITS ,PJT_PR_CONTACT ,to_char(PJT_PR_CREATEDATE) AS "PJT_PR_CREATEDATE" ,USER_NO ,USER_NAME ,PROFILE ,COUNT FROM PJT_PR_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) ORDER BY PJT_PR_CREATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJT_PR_BOARD (pjt_pr_no, PJT_PR_TITLE, PJT_PR_START, PJT_PR_PERIOD, PJT_PR_DEADLINE, PJT_PR_STACK, PJT_PR_FACE, PJT_PR_CONTACT, PJT_PR_CAPACITY, PJT_PR_CONTENT, PJT_PR_RECRUITS, PJT_PR_CREATEDATE, USER_NO, PJT_PR_FIELD, COUNT) values(SEQ_PJT_PR.NEXTVAL, #{pjtPrTitle}, #{pjtPrStart}, #{pjtPrPeriod}, #{pjtPrDeadline}, #{pjtPrStack}, #{pjtPrFace}, #{pjtPrContact}, #{pjtPrCapacity}, #{pjtPrContent}, #{pjtPrRecruits}, to_char(sysdate,'yy/MM/dd HH24:mi'), #{userNo}, #{pjtPrField}, 0)
mapper.update: update PJT_PR_BOARD set count = count + 1 where PJT_PR_NO = #{pjtPrNo}
mapper.select: select PSN_PR_NO ,PSN_PR_STACK ,PSN_PR_CONTENT ,PSN_PR_AVLPRD ,PSN_PR_TITLE ,PSN_PR_CONTACT ,to_char(PJT_PR_CREATEDATE) AS "PJT_PR_CREATEDATE" ,USER_NO ,PROFILE ,USER_NAME ,CATEGORY ,COUNT FROM PSN_PR_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) where PSN_PR_NO = #{PSN_PR_NO}

SELECT * FROM PJT_PR_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE
PJT_PR_STACK like '%${pjtPrStack}%'
ORDER BY PJT_PR_CREATEDATE DESC
